thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location and Affordable Price
thread.title_full: Great Location and Affordable Price - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Clare L
title: Great Location and Affordable Price
text: I've stayed in this hotel twice and had a great experience both times. The locaton is great, it's close to many different subway lines but a bit quieter than hotels in times sqaure. The facilities are nice and the rooms do not feel like the stereotypical tiny NYC hotel room.
